title: Broken Ping Counter
body: Not sure if this is where i would post this, but my ping is always at 60, never changes at all. But the game is lagging like its at 200 or more ping. There has been points where i have disconnected from lag and its still at 60. Sometime it will drop to 59 but that is it.

replies.body: It sounds like you're having network issues that's having trouble maintaining communication to the game server.  I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot and fix whatever is causing that to happen.  Let me know if you have any questions!
